General.Name: Euroland Corporate SA
General.Description: Euroland Corporate Société anonyme offers fund raising services for listed companies in France. The company engages in the provision of advisory services for structuring of the fundraising; setting-up and structuring of operations; drafting of prospectuses, URDs, operation notes, and BALO; relationship management and interface; organization and coordination of investor roadshows; sponsor listing and advisory services for IPOs, direct listing on access, and market transfer; realization of public takeover offers, free allocation of BSA, and drafting of URD; and stock market upgradation and sponsor listing activities. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Paris, France.
